Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

river_painter5.desc: Pour this serum into the river to make the water electric for 900 seconds. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

river_painter6.desc: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into a purple bubbling potion for 900 seconds. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

river_painter7.desc: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into blood for 900 seconds. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

super_blink.desc:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.
super_blink.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

keen_optic.attrib:
+ 75 Cast Range
+ 1.25 Mana Regeneration
keen_optic.lore: Stolen from a tinker's shop ages ago, this handy lens has seen service to many owners.

grove_bow.desc:
Passive: Magic Amp

Reduces magic resistance of the attacked enemy by 12%.
grove_bow.attrib:
+ 100 Attack Range (Ranged Only)
+ 15 Attack Speed
grove_bow.lore: A gift from the moon goddess to one of her prized disciples many memories ago.

quickening_charm.desc:
Passive: Cooldown Reduction

Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 12%
quickening_charm.lore: An evergreen amulet of druidic origins.

philosophers_stone.desc: Increases gold income and mana, while reducing outgoing attack damage.
philosophers_stone.attrib:
+GPM BONUS 70
+ 200 Mana
-Attack Damage 30
philosophers_stone.lore: A weightless charm created by an enchanter with a powerful scorn for brute force.

force_boots.desc:
Active: Force

Dispels the user and pushes them 750 units in the direction they are facing.

Passive: Speed Unlock

Completely removes the speed limit for the wearer
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
force_boots.lore: Elusive marvels never successfully studied for proper classification in the archives.

desolator_2.desc:
Passive: Greater Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 10 for 7 seconds.
desolator_2.lore: The original demonic favorite that served as basis for the beloved mortal design.

phoenix_ash.desc:
Passive: Rebirth

Lethal damage is prevented and instead the wearer is healed to half health and non-ultimate ability cooldowns reset. Gets consumed on trigger.

seer_stone.desc:
Active: Reveal

Reveal a target 800 area of the map for 5 seconds.
seer_stone.attrib:
+ 350 Cast Range
+Vision Bonus 350
+ 10 Mana Regeneration
seer_stone.lore: The curious creation of a wizard who professed to hail from another time.

greater_mango.desc:
Consume Unbelievably Good Mango

Overwhelms your hero, causing you to die. However, when you respawn, you will have all talents on both sides skilled.

elixer.desc:
Use: Consume

Restores 500 health and 250 mana to the target over 6 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: %abilitycastrange%

craggy_coat.desc: Increases the wearer's armor, while reducing their attack speed.
craggy_coat.attrib:
12 Armor
-Attack Speed 35
+ 150 Health

timeless_relic.desc: Increases all outgoing spell damage and debuff duration.
timeless_relic.attrib:
+ 25% Debuff Duration
+ 15% Spell Damage
timeless_relic.lore: An unmarred discovery from the excavated ruins of an ancient wizard's academy.

mirror_shield.desc:
Passive: Echo Shield

Block and reflect most targeted spells back to their caster once every 8 seconds.
mirror_shield.lore: The shield that long ago robbed the old one of his first memories.

ironwood_tree.desc:
Use: Plant Tree

Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
ironwood_tree.lore: Precious. And hearty as a weed.

mango_tree.desc:
Use: Plant a Mango Tree

Targets the ground to plant a mango tree that provides unlimited mango power. The tree generates Enchanted Mangoes every 60 seconds, and provides unobstructed vision in the area

Range: %abilitycastrange%

royal_jelly.desc:
Use: Consume

Grants a target allied unit a permanent buff that provides +2.25 Health Regen and +1.25 Mana Regen.

Does not stack on the same unit.
royal_jelly.lore: To those who harvest olgru jelly, success serves more than mere profit--it's often the means to survival--for only the jelly itself can cure the ravages that follow a sting from the vigilant denizens of the giant hives.

pupils_gift.lore: An astounding plate of ever-replenishing, fortifying fruit.

tome_of_aghanim.desc:
Use: Consume

Temporarily grants an allied target the Aghanim's Scepter buff for 3 minutes.

repair_kit.desc:
Use: Building Repair

Targets a building, restoring 40% of it's health over 30 seconds. Also grants +10 armor during this period.

Range: %abilitycastrange%

mind_breaker.desc:
Passive: Silence Strike

The next attack silences the hit enemy for 1.5 seconds.
mind_breaker.attrib:
MAGIC ATTACK BONUS DAMAGE: 25
ATTACK SPEED: 25
mind_breaker.lore: A bewitching blade of indeterminate form capable of piercing the psyche of even the most willful foe.

third_eye.desc:
Passive: True Sight

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 500 range of its carrier.

Passive: Charge Loss

Loses a charge on death. After all charges are lost, the item disappears.

spell_prism.desc:
Passive: Cooldown Reduction

Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 18%.
spell_prism.attrib:
+ 12 All Attributes
+ 4 Mana Regeneration
spell_prism.lore: Even the slightest flaw in the components of a spell prism can result in the death of its user.

princes_knife.desc:
Passive: Hex Strike

The next attack hexes the hit enemy into a frog for 1.5 seconds.

witless_shako.desc: Increases the wearer's max health, while reducing their max mana.
witless_shako.attrib:
+Max Health Increase 1350
-Max Mana 400

imp_claw.desc:
Passive: Critical Strike

Empowers your next attack, causing it to be a critical strike dealing 130% damage.
imp_claw.lore: Though their tasks are largely thankless, demon hunters can often turn a profit bartering parts in Weeping Rose.

flicker.desc:
Active: Flicker

Dispells debuffs and blinks you to a random spot within 450 range. Does not get disabled on incoming damage.
flicker.lore: The technically-true-to-his-word 'teleportation device' crafted by a notorious fae trickster.

spy_gadget.desc:
Passive: Prescient Aura

Lowers Scan cooldown by 50% . Increases attack and cast range of allies in a 1200 unit radius.
spy_gadget.attrib:
SCAN COOLDOWN REDUCTION: 50%
AURA BONUS ATTACK RANGE: 135
AURA BONUS CAST RANGE: 135
spy_gadget.lore: A handy tool that manages to make close what once was far.

spider_legs.desc:
Active: Scurry

Grants you 24% bonus movement speed and free pathing for 3 seconds. Walking over trees causes them to be destroyed.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
spider_legs.lore: A horrifying yet useful mixture of necromancy and artificing.

helm_of_the_undying.desc:
Passive: Death Delay

Survive for an extra 5 seconds after receiving a killing blow.

vambrace.desc:
Also provides one of the following, based on the Vambrace's main attribute:
Strength: +10% Magic Resistance
Agility: +10 Attack Speed
Intelligence: +6% Spell Amp
vambrace.lore: The coveted treasure that divided the heirs of Queen Raiya upon her death, resulting in the eventual downfall of her kingdom.

horizon.desc:
Active: Blink Strike

Targets a unit to teleport to them. Knocks enemies back 250 distance and disables them for 1 second.

Range: %abilitycastrange%

fusion_rune.desc:
Use: Consume

Grants the target the bonuses of every Power Rune for 50 seconds. Each use consumes a charge.

ocean_heart.desc:
Passive: Water Regen

Provides you with 8 HP regen and 4 mana regen while in the river.
ocean_heart.lore: A charm blessed by the Council of the Brine.

broom_handle.attrib:
+ 50 Attack Range (Melee Only)
+ 12 Damage
+ 3 Armor
broom_handle.lore: The surprisingly dangerous creation of an apprentice sorcerer with a strange fondness for brooms.

trusty_shovel.desc:
Active: Dig

Channel for %abilitychanneltime% second.
Can find a Bounty Rune, a Flask, a TP Scroll, or an enemy Kobold.
trusty_shovel.lore: Former plaything of a young deity, received as a gift from his uncle.

nether_shawl.desc: Increases the wearer's magic resistance and magic damage, while decreasing their armor.
nether_shawl.attrib:
+ 25% Magic Resistance
+ 8% Spell Damage
-Armor 3
nether_shawl.lore: An otherworldly garment tethered to our plane by unknown means.

dragon_scale.desc:
Passive: Afterburn

Causes attacks to burn the enemy, dealing 18 damage per second for 3 seconds. Affects buildings.
dragon_scale.lore: The remains of a dragon always outvalue the wealth of even the most prodigious hoard.

essence_ring.desc:
Active: Life Essence

Increases your current and max health by 400 for 15 seconds.
essence_ring.lore: An ancient bauble blessed by the breath of Verodicia.

clumsy_net.desc:
Active: Ensnare

Ensnares the target enemy and yourself for 1.75 seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
clumsy_net.attrib:
+ 5 All Attributes
+ 2 Mana Regeneration

enchanted_quiver.desc:
Passive: Certain Strike

Empowers your next attack with 300 bonus magical damage and True Strike. Ranged Attackers have +400 bonus range for the attack.
enchanted_quiver.lore: A graceful gift blessed by the goddess of the hunt.

ninja_gear.desc:
Active: Solitary Disguise

Casts Smoke of Deceit on yourself only.
ninja_gear.lore: Valuable equipment recovered by a young explorer sifting through the flotsam and detritus drifting in the void.

illusionsts_cape.desc:
Active: Create Illusion

Creates an image under your control.

Passive: Illusion Mastery

Increases outgoing damage of all units and illusions controlled by the hero by 8%.
illusionsts_cape.attrib:
IMAGE DURATION: 30
IMAGE DAMAGE: 50%
IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN: 200%
+ 14 Agility
+ 14 Strength
illusionsts_cape.lore: A dashing cape whose creator insists on calling 'Cloak of Apparition' as opposed to his assistant's 'Illusion' drivel.

havoc_hammer.desc:
Active: Havoc

Knocks back enemies in 400 range around you, slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 + 1x your str as magical damage.

panic_button.desc:
Passive: Rejuvenate

When the wearer's health falls below 20%, they will receive a hard dispel and be healed for 300 health.

apex.lore: Three orbs of remarkable power bound within a single scepter.

ballista.desc:
Passive: Knockback

Knocks back enemies 50 distance and deals 50 pure damage with every attack.
ballista.lore: A simple design much improved by a master smith's loving hand.

woodland_striders.desc:
Active: Woodland Stride

Create a path of trees behind you for 3 seconds. Trees last up to 15 seconds.

Passive: Tree Walking

Removes movement speed limit and allows free pathing through trees.

Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
woodland_striders.attrib:
+ 140 Movement Speed
+ 60 HP Regeneration

demonicon.desc:
Active: Greater Demonic Summoning

Summon 2 sets of Level 3 Necronomicon Units that last 75 seconds. Units have 100% more health and 50% more damage.
demonicon.lore: A record of the final reckoning. With one page torn out.

fallen_sky.desc:
Active: Fallen Sky

Transform into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after 0.5 seconds in a 315 AoE, stunning enemies for 2 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage every 1 seconds to enemy units and buildings for 6 seconds.

Building Impact Damage: 75
Building Over Time Damage: 50

Non-Building Impact Damage: 150
Non-Building Over Time Damage: 90

Range: %abilitycastrange%
fallen_sky.attrib:
+ 20 Strength
+ 20 Intelligence
+ 15 HP Regeneration
+ 10 Mana Regeneration
fallen_sky.lore: One of the few surviving creations of the acolytes of the Wyrmforge.

pirate_hat.desc:
Active: Dig

Channel for %abilitychanneltime% second.
Always finds a Bounty Rune!
pirate_hat.lore: A salty skulltopper cursed with endless good fortune.

dimensional_doorway.desc:
Active

Teleport instantly anywhere on the map.

ex_machina.desc:
Active: Reset Item Cooldowns

Reset the cooldown on all items (except Refresher Orb).
ex_machina.lore: The remains of an ancient universe, preserved within a single sphere.

faded_broach.lore: A life-saving jewel bestowed upon a young queen by a kindly vizier.

paladin_sword.desc:
Passive: Greater Healing

Amplifies the wearer's Regeneration, Healing, Lifesteal and Spell Lifesteal by 14%.
paladin_sword.lore: The sigil blade of the legendary Brother Yhols of Gausra, stripped from its scabbard on the day of his controversial excommunication.

minotaur_horn.desc:
Active: Lesser Avatar

Grants Spell Immunity for 2 seconds.
minotaur_horn.lore: The trophy from a mighty beast ambushed and slain in the recesses of its own home.

orb_of_destruction.desc:
Passive: Impeding Corruption

Attacks reduce the target's armor and movement speed. Slow amount varies based on whether the wearer is melee or ranged.
orb_of_destruction.attrib:
ARMOR REDUCTION: 4
SLOW (MELEE): 25%
SLOW (RANGE): 15%
DURATION: 4
orb_of_destruction.lore: An ingot of chaos suspended in wizard's ether, housed within an arcanist's orb.

the_leveller.attrib:
+ 60 Attack Speed
BONUS BUILDING DAMAGE: 25%
the_leveller.lore: A demonic blade that struck the final blow to crack the gates of the Sanctum of Solanas.

arcane_ring.desc:
Active: Replenish Mana

Restores 75 mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: 1200
arcane_ring.lore: Once a prized heirloom of a minor lord's house.

titan_sliver.desc: Increases the wearer's attack damage, magic and status resistance.
titan_sliver.attrib:
+Base Attack Damage 20%
+ 16% Magic Resistance
+ 12% Status Resistance
titan_sliver.lore: Though many desire this brilliant shard for its obvious qualities, a school of study exists to determine the true size and purpose of its incomprehensible whole.

chipped_vest.desc:
Passive

Everytime you are attacked, you return 28 damage to heroes and 17 damage to creeps.
chipped_vest.lore: It doesn't look like much, but it's oddly comfy.

wizard_glass.desc:
Active

Deals 125 damage to up to 2 random enemy units within 700.

gloves_of_travel.desc: Reduces TP cooldown by 20 seconds and causes TP scrolls to not be consumed.

elven_tunic.attrib:
+ 26 Attack Speed
+ 16% Evasion
+ 8% Movement Speed
elven_tunic.lore: Even simple items of elven make seem imbued with inexplicable efficacy.

cloak_of_flames.desc:
Passive

Burns enemy units for 45 damage per second.

Radius: 375
cloak_of_flames.lore: A very fine cloak that plays host to an overly-protective living flame.

venom_gland.attrib:
PRIMARY ATTRIBUTE: 10
DEBUFF AMP: 12%
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 25
HEALTH REGEN REDUCTION: 25%

trickster_cloak.desc:
Active: Cloak

Causes you to become invisible for 6 seconds.
trickster_cloak.lore: A fantastic garment immediately misplaced by its creator upon completion.

gladiator_helm.desc: Upon taking hero damage, you gains 18 damage, 5 armor, 15 for 7 seconds.

possessed_mask.desc:
Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for 7% of attack damage dealt.
possessed_mask.lore: Even when discarded with specific purpose and great care, this frightening mask always finds its way onto the face of a new owner.

ancient_perseverance.attrib:
+ 10 Damage
+ 7 HP Regeneration
+Mana Regen Amplification 50%

star_mace.desc:
Passive: Cleave

Melee heroes deal 20% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to 650 around the target.
star_mace.attrib:
+ 10% Movement Speed
+ 1 Mana Regeneration

penta_edged_sword.desc:
Passive: Maim

Each attack has a 20% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by 20% and attack speed by 60 for 3 seconds.
penta_edged_sword.attrib:
+ 45 Damage
+ 80 Attack Range (Melee Only)
penta_edged_sword.lore: The final, twisted work of a severely pious blacksmith, completed immediately before the taking of his own life.

oakheart.desc:
Active: Rejuvenate

Target an allied hero and restore 480 health over 12 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

warhammer.desc:
Active: Warhammer

Deals 75 damage and reduces the target's armor by 3 for 6 seconds.

bullwhip.desc:
Active: Whip

Grants 20% movement speed when cast on allies, and slows by 20% when cast on enemies. Lasts 4 seconds.
bullwhip.attrib:
+ 3 HP Regeneration
+ 3 Mana Regeneration
bullwhip.lore: Once the favored lash of an infamous broker of pit fighters and other live trade.

psychic_headband.desc:
Active: Pyschic Push

Pushes the target enemy unit away from you 400 distance.
psychic_headband.lore: A failed experiment in finer telekinetic control, still fit for other ends.

ceremonial_robe.desc:
Passive: Ceremonial Aura

Lowers enemy Status Resistance by 10% and Magic Resistance by 10%.

Radius: 1200
ceremonial_robe.lore: One of many items lost in the looting of Zelenwyr's sacred reliquary.

quicksilver_amulet.desc:
Passive: Quicksilver

Grants you a bonus 5% movement speed and 15 attack speed anytime one of your abilities are on cooldown.
quicksilver_amulet.attrib:
+ 5% Movement Speed
+ 10 Attack Speed
+Attack Animation Speed 30%
+Attack Projectile Speed 30%
quicksilver_amulet.lore: An enchanted talisman brimming with a mysterious substance.

book_of_shadows.desc:
Active: Shadows

Target an enemy, ally or self. Causes the target to become untargetable but also silenced, muted and disarmed for 3 seconds. Applies a Basic Dispel.
book_of_shadows.lore: An impossible tome filled with unreadable prose of unknowable thoughts.

giants_ring.desc:
Passive: Giant's Foot

Can path over any terrain and deals 100% of your strength per second to units you are standing ontop of.
giants_ring.attrib:
+Strength 40
+ 60 Movement Speed
+Model Scale 60%
giants_ring.lore: Prized procurement of an otherwise unremarkable ruler of Elze who abdicated his position and vanished.

vengeances_shadow.desc:
Passive: Vengeance's Shadow

Upon death, you spawn a strong-illusion that deals 100% damage and takes 150% damage. Can cast all basic spells. Illusion casts 30 seconds.

stormcrafter.desc:
Active

Cyclones your hero for 0.75 seconds.

Passive

Zaps an enemy within 700 range, dealing 200 damage and a 40% slow for 0.3 seconds. Strikes every 3 seconds.
stormcrafter.lore: The accidental byproduct of a spell conjured to entrap a lesser god.

overflowing_elixir.desc: Restores 500 health, and 200 mana over 4 seconds. Can capture runes.

mysterious_hat.attrib:
+ 100 Health
+ 5% Spell Damage
+ 5% Manacost Reduction
mysterious_hat.lore: A small token imbued with the fortune of the fae in recognition of an intriguing display of mortal kindness.
